record.title: ORDERS FOR WEDNESDAY, APRIL 2, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR WEDNESDAY, APRIL 2, 2008 -- (Senate - April 01, 2008)

[Page: S2311]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 9:30 a.m. tomorrow, Wednesday, April 2; that following the prayer and the pledge, the journal of Proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and that the Senate resume consideration of the motion to proceed to H.R. 3221, and that all time during any adjournment, recess or period of morning business count postcloture; further, that at 12:30 p.m., the majority leader be recognized.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
